parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.item.json;
const phoneIndex = parseInt(data.phone_index) || 1;
const update = {
  lead_id: data.lead_id,
  call_status: data.call_status,
  agent_id: data.agent_id,
  current_phone_index: data.current_phone_index,
  call_outcome: data.call_outcome,
  call_attempts: data.call_attempts,
  call_successful: data.call_successful,
  next_call_date: data.next_call_date,
  call_cost: data.call_cost,
  call_summary: data.call_summary,
  user_sentiment: data.user_sentiment,
  interest_level: data.interest_level,
  objection_reason: data.objection_reason,
  callback_time: data.callback_time,
  decision_maker: data.decision_maker,
  pain_points: data.pain_points,
  next_steps: data.next_steps,
  follow_up_status: data.follow_up_status,
  meeting_scheduled: data.meeting_scheduled,
  email_captured: data.email_captured,
  phone_captured: data.phone_captured,
  demo_scheduled: data.demo_scheduled,
  is_hot: data.is_hot
};
if (phoneIndex === 1) update.phone_1_status = data.phone_status;
if (phoneIndex === 2) update.phone_2_status = data.phone_status;
if (phoneIndex === 3) update.phone_3_status = data.phone_status;
return [{ json: update }];
